name: The Frog Pirates: Escape From Puppet Island
name_original: The Frog Pirates: Escape From Puppet Island
description:
The Frog Pirates: Escape From Puppet Island is an RPG with Fighting Game Mechanics for combat. This is a prototype with placeholder art to test the different systems and overall feel

You play as the Captain of The Frog Pirates. After landing on an unmarked island, you take the time to train and get ready for an adventure. But during training you hear a scream. It's your crew being kidnapped! You follow their scream and find a mysterious hotel. Can you save your crew before it's too late?

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement

J, K, L - Confirm, Cancel

Fighter Mode:

P1: WASD + JKL

P2: Arrow Keys + Numpad 1 2 3
